    update(Observable, Object) - Method in class model.ScoreTracker
    the ScoreTracker tracks the player's (observable) total interactable object searches through the observer pattern whener the interactable object gets opened, fires an event to notify this object
    update(Observable, Object) - Method in class view.AudioManager
    plays a sound via AudioManager.playSound(String) whenever an observable object sends a specific notification

    updates the EnemyView.currentRoom whenever it changes.

    updates the InteractableObjectsView.currentRoom via the observer pattern, whenever the player enters a new room and changes LevelManager.

    updateCurrentInteractable() - Method in class model.entities.Player
    check if player is near an interactable object, sets the Player.currentInteractable field if it is near.
